mapper.select: SELECT l.lesson_title, l.lesson_date, l.lesson_info, t.tiper_user_id, t.tiper_info, r.review_sugar FROM review r inner join lesson l on r.review_lesson_num=l.lesson_num inner join tiper t on l.lesson_tiper_code = t.tiper_code ORDER BY l.lesson_date DESC

SELECT l.lesson_title, l.lesson_date, l.lesson_info, t.tiper_user_id, t.tiper_info, r.review_sugar FROM review r inner join lesson l on r.review_lesson_num=l.lesson_num inner join tiper t on l.lesson_tiper_code = t.tiper_code AND LESSON_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{lesson_search}, '%')
AND TIPER_USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{lesson_search}, '%')

SELECT lesson.LESSON_DATE, lesson.LESSON_TITLE, escrow.ESCROW_USER_ID as lesson_info FROM escrow, lesson WHERE #{lesson_tiper_code} = escrow.ESCROW_tiper_code AND lesson.LESSON_NUM = escrow.ESCROW_LESSON_NUM

select lesson.LESSON_TITLE, lesson.LESSON_USER_NAME, escrow.ESCROW_LESSON_NUM as lesson_num,lesson.LESSON_IMG from lesson, escrow where (select user_id from users WHERE user_id =#{lesson_info}) = escrow.ESCROW_USER_ID AND (SELECT escrow_lesson_num WHERE escrow_user_id = #{lesson_info}) = lesson.LESSON_NUM
mapper.update: update lesson set lesson_title = #{lesson_title}, lesson_info = #{lesson_info}, lesson_img = #{lesson_img} where lesson_num = #{lesson_num}
mapper.insert: insert into lesson(lesson_tiper_code, lesson_title, lesson_info, lesson_cate, lesson_img) values(#{lesson_tiper_code}, #{lesson_title}, #{lesson_info}, #{lesson_cate}, #{lesson_img})
